name: Monster Dentist Surgery Adventure - Free Kids Doctor Games
name_original: Monster Dentist Surgery Adventure - Free Kids Doctor Games
description:
Ouch, these monsters need your dentist skills! They have come to the Monster Dentist Surgery for you to fix their teeth!
Choose from 4 monsters, Frankenstein, Glove Man, Mask Man and Dracula, all of them have terrible teeth and need you to get them back to being nice and shiny!

Use realistic tools such as dentist drills and toothbrushes, drill away cavities, fillings and tooth debris, replace teeth with new shapes, decorate with paint, stickers or both!

With fun game play to keep coming back for more, isn't it about time you visit the Monster Dentist?
